Docs.summary: Provides a way to render object values as HTML.

Docs.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
An expression that identifies the object that contains the properties to display.
Docs.summary: Returns HTML markup for each property in the object that is represented by the specified expression.
Docs.returns: The HTML markup for each property in the object that is represented by the expression.
